thread.title: Colorado Springs police: Man, 20, shot by friend cleaning gun

title: Colorado Springs police: Man, 20, shot by friend cleaning gun
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
Colorado Springs police say a 20-year-old man was accidentally shot Thursday night by a friend who was cleaning a gun.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
